title: Teen wanted in Richmond Black Friday shooting death
content:
RICHMOND, VA (WWBT) -
Richmond police are searching for a 17-year-old who they say killed another 17-year-old in the city's latest homicide.
Ishmael D. Brown is now wanted on charges of murder in the death of George M. Carrington III on Friday in Providence Park. Carrington of Chimborazo Boulevard was found shot to death outside a car around 5:39 p.m. following a crash at the intersection of Milton St. and Meadowbridge Rd.
Brown is described as a black male, 6’0”, weighing approximately 150 pounds with black hair and brown eyes. He is considered armed and dangerous and should not be approached. Anyone who sees him is asked to call police immediately.
Police ask anyone with information to contact Crime Stoppers at (804) 780-1000.
